description:
――Full dive VR technology has been completed and we can meet Vtuber.

A high school boy, Kazuto who loves Vtuber suddenly decides to become a beautiful girl Vtuber himself.

Kazuto has started streaming as the beautiful girl Vtuber, Kanae with her own “super-cute female voice” and “game sense” as weapons.

Since then, Kanae’s subscribers has grown steadily, but one day something unexpected happened.

She receives a super chat from Inori, the most popular Vtuber in the world. In addition, the maximum amount of 50,000 yen is used to write “Shall I give you more? I can give you as much as you want.”

In short, Inori was a big fan of Kanae.

After that incident, their relationship as Vtubers deepened, and they finally came to be treated as “sisters” by their viewers.

By the way, the two are actually classmates.

Inori is actually the girl whose Kazuto confessed to and rejected him.

In other words, she is the girl who says “Eh, you like me?…I’m sorry.” and “Kanae-chan is cute!! I love you!!” in VR!

―― Anyway, this is an extremely turbulent and super misunderstood love comedy where real life and VR intersect!>
